channel.title: SDP Developer Documentation on Dynamic Simulation Environment
channel.description: Recent content in SDP Developer Documentation on Dynamic Simulation Environment

item.title: SDP Workflows
item.description: The SDP builds simulations using Git repositories which contain both models and their associated workflows. The workflows are defined using Task, and implemented with containerized tool-chains. Additional metadata, embedded in the Taskfile, makes is possible for the SDP to automate the task of configuring and operating the workflows. Layout Go based Tools Models are typically written in the C Language using an established repository layout. Within that layout, workflow tools can be written in any programming language.
